1130:2: evaṃ yogyacitto daśasu dikṣu śeṣasya jagato duḥkhasāgaroddharaṇābhisaṃbodhyupāyo vyomaparyantatraikālyasarvadharmavaśavartitvāyaiva tu punaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāmavataret |
1130:5: yathoktamāryatathāgataguhyasūtre- tadyathāpi nāma śāntamate vṛkṣasya mūlacchinnasya sarvaśākhāpatrapalāśāḥ śuṣyanti,
1130:9: so'sau śikṣa na jātu trasatī[ oṣirī?] sugatānāṃ
1130:10: so'sau śūru na jātu istriṇāṃ vaśametī |
1130:20: so'sau chidyati aṅgamaṅgaśo na ca kṣumyo |
1130:24: pañco tasya abhijña bhāvitā imi nityaṃ
1130:25: purataḥ so sugatāna sthāsyatī sa ca śūraḥ || ityādi ||
1130:26: bhagavatyāmapyuktam- punaraparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena buddhakāyaṃ niṣpādayitukāmena dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānyaśītiṃ cānuvyañjanāni pratilabdhukāmena sarvatra jātau jātismaratāṃ bodhicittāvipraṇāśatāṃ bodhisattvacaryāsaṃpramoṣatāṃ pratilabdhukāmena sarvapāpamitrapāpasahāyān vivarjayitukāmena sarvabuddhabodhisattvakalyāṇamitrāṇyārāgayitukāmena sarvamāramārakāyikadevatā nirjetukāmena sarvāvaraṇīyāni śodhayitukāmena sarvadharmānāvaraṇatāṃ pratilabdhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam |
1130:27: punaraparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ye daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti,
1130:28: te me varṇaṃ bhāveran iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam |
1130:29: punaraparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ekacittotpādena pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn samatikrāmitukāmena |
1130:36: tathā pitṛputrasamāgame darśitam- ṣaḍdhāturayaṃ mahārāja puruṣaḥ ṣaṭsparśāyatanaḥ aṣṭādaśamanaupavicāraḥ |
1130:37: ṣaḍdhāturayaṃ mahārāja puruṣa iti na khalu punaretadyuktam-kiṃ vaitatpratītyoktaṃ ṣaḍime mahārāja dhātavaḥ |
1130:54: tena pratyekamindriyaṣaṭkena saumanasyāditrayāṇāṃ bhedā[da]ṣṭādaśa manaupavicārā bhavanti |
1130:64: tatra mahārāja ādhyātmikaḥ pṛthivīdhaturutpadyamāno na kutaścidāgacchati,
1130:66: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yatstrī adhyātmamahaṃ strīti kalpayati |
1130:67: sā adhyātmamahaṃ strīti kalpayitvā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayati |
1130:68: sā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayitvā saṃraktā satī bahirdhā puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃyogamākāṅkṣate |
1130:72: tatra mahārāja yaśca saṃkalpo yaśca saṃkalpayitā,
1130:82: iti hi mahārāja saṃkalpaṃ jñātvā kakkhaṭatvaṃ veditavyam |
1130:85: bhavati mahārāja samayo yadayaṃ kāyaḥ śmaśānaparyavasāno bhavati |
1130:86: tasya tatkakkhaṭatvaṃ saṃklidyamānaṃ nirudhyamānaṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ gacchati,
1130:87: na dakṣiṇāṃ na paścimāṃ nottarāṃ nordhvaṃ nādho na tu vidiśaṃ gacchati |
1130:89: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yadākāśībhūte lokasaṃniveśe brāhmaṃ vimānaṃ saṃtiṣṭhate mahāratnamayam |
1130:91: cakravālamahācakravālāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante dṛḍhāḥ sārā ekaghanā vajramayāḥ |
1130:93: sumeravaḥ parvatarājāno yugaṃdharā nirmidharā īśādhārā yāvatkālaparvatāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante |
1130:97: tadapi mahārāja kakkhaṭatvaṃ samudāgacchat na kutaścidāgacchati |
1130:98: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yadā ayaṃ lokaḥ saṃvartate |
1130:102: tasyā agninā dahyamānāyā maṣirapi na prajñāyate |
1130:103: tadyathāpi nāma sarpiṣo vā tailasya vā agninā dahyamānasya na maṣirna chārikā prajñāyate,
1130:104: evameva asyāstrisāhastramahāsāhastrāyā lokadhātoragninā dahyamānāyā naiva maṣirna chārikā avaśiṣṭā prajñāyate |
1130:105: evamadbhirlavaṇavilayavadvāyunā vairambhavātābhihataśakuntavatpṛthivyāṃ na kiṃcidavaśiṣṭaṃ prajñāyata iti paṭhayate |
1130:109: iti hi mahārāja pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātutvena nopalabhyate'nyatra vyavahārāt |
1130:110: so'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ |
1130:117: tadyathā aśru svedaḥ kheṭaḥ siṅghāṇakaṃ vasā lasīkā majjā medaḥ pittaṃ śleṣmā pūyaḥ śoṇitaṃ kṣīraṃ prastrāva ityādi |
1130:120: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yatpriyaṃ dṛṣṭvā aśru pravartate |
1130:121: duḥkhena cābhyāhatasya dharmasaṃvegena vā aśru pravartate |
1130:124: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yadādhyātmiko'bdhātuḥ pariśuṣyati |
1130:127: vivartamāne khalu punarloke samantād dvātriṃśatpaṭalā abhraghanāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante |
1130:133: tata iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī yāvad brahmalokādudakena sphuṭā bhavati |
1130:134: sa mahārāja tāvān mahānabdhāturutpadyamāno na kutaścidāgacchati |
1130:135: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yadayaṃ lokaḥ saṃvartate |
1130:136: saṃvartamāne khalu punarloke dvitīyasya sūryasya prādurbhāvo bhavati |
1130:137: dvitīyasya sūryasya loke prādurbhāvādutsāḥ sarāṃsi kunadyaśca śuṣyanti |
1130:141: caturthasya sūryasya prādurbhāvānmahāsamudrasya yojanikamapyudakaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchati |
1130:144: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yanmahāsamudre pṛthitapṛthitānyavaśiṣṭhāni bhavanti |
1130:146: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yanmahāsamudre'ṅgulisnehamātramapyudakaṃ nāvaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati |
1130:153: so'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ |
1130:160: yena vā asyāśitapītakhāditāni samyaksukhena paripākaṃ gacchati |
1130:161: yasya cotsadatvājjavarito jvarita iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati |
1130:165: yanmanuṣyā araṇīsahagatebhyo garbhalasahagatebhyo vā gomayacūrṇena vā kāṃrpāsapicunā va samanveṣante |
1130:168: yāvad dvīpaṃ vā kakṣaṃ tṛṇānāṃ vā dāvaṃ vā kāṣṭhaṃ vā yāvaddahan paraitītyādi |
1130:175: evaṃ yatkiṃcidasmin kāye vāyurvāyugataṃ laghutvaṃ samudīraṇatvam |
1130:177: tadyathā ūrdhvagamā vāyavo'dhogamāḥ pārśvāśrayāḥ pṛṣṭhāśrayāḥ kukṣigamāḥ śastrakāḥ kṣurakāḥ sūcakāḥ pippalakā vātāṣṭhīlā vātagulmā āśvāsapraśvāsā aṅgānusāriṇo vāyava ityādi |
1130:178: santi bahirdhā pūrve vāyavo dakṣiṇāḥ paścimā uttarā vāyavaḥ,
1130:181: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yanmahān vāyuskandhaḥ samudāgataḥ vṛkṣāgrānapi pātayati |
1130:184: yaṃ sattvāścīvarakarṇikena vā vidhamanakena vātānuvṛttane vā paryeṣante |
1130:192: yadasmin kāye cakṣuḥ suṣiramiti vā yāvanmukhaṃ vā mukhadvāraṃ vā kaṇṭhaṃ vā kaṇṭhanāḍayo vā |
1130:198: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yatkarmapratyayādāyatanāni prādurbhavanti,
1130:208: tadyathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣa utthale deśe udapānaṃ vā kuṭakaṃ vā kūpaṃ vā puṣkariṇīṃ vā khānayet |
1130:212: bhagavānāha- tadyathāpi nāma mahārāja sa puruṣaḥ punareva tadudapānaṃ vā yāvatpuṣkariṇīṃ vā pūrayet,
1130:216: na hyakāśadhāturgamane vā āgamane vā pratyupasthitaḥ |
1130:218: bhagavānāha- iti hi mahārāja bāhyākāśadhāturacalaḥ avikāraḥ |
1130:229: iti hi yā ṣaḍindriyādhipateyā ṣaḍviṣayārambaṇā viṣayavijñaptiḥ,
1130:231: sa khalu punarayaṃ mahārāja vijñānadhāturnendriyaniśrito na viṣayebhya āgato na madhye'ntarasthāyī |
1130:233: sa khalu punarayaṃ mahārāja vijñānadhāturvastu prativijñapya niruddhaḥ |
1130:239: iti mahārāja vijñānadhāturvijñānadhātutvena śūnyo nopalabhyate'nyatra vyavahārāt |
1130:240: so'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ |
1130:250: na hi pṛthivīdhātuprasādaḥ kasyaciddharmāyatanaṃ vā āyatanapratilambhena vā pratyupasthitaḥ |
1130:251: evaṃ yāvanna vāyudhātuprasādaḥ kasyaciddharmasyāyatanaṃ vā āyatanapratilambhena vā pratyupasthitaḥ |
1130:254: iti hi mahārāja ekaikato dharmān mṛgyamāṇān cakṣurāyatanaṃ nopalabhyate'nyatra vyavahārāt |
1130:260: yeṣāṃ na prasādo na kṣobha upalabhyate,
1130:276: yāvaditi hi mahārāja sarvadharmā vimokṣābhimukhā dharmadhātuniyatā ākāśadhātuparyavasānā aprāptikā avyavahārā anabhilāpyā anabhilāpanīyāḥ |
1130:282: tatra cakṣū rūpe pratihanyata iti nipātaḥ pratihanyanā teṣāṃ nirdiṣṭā |
1130:283: tathā hi cakṣū rūpeṣu trividhaṃ nipatatīti anukūleṣu śubhasaṃjñayā,
1130:300: tadyathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svaprāntare jana padakalyāṇyā striyā sārdha paricaret |
1130:302: tatkiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyate svaprāntare janapadakalyāṇī strī ?
1130:304: bhagavānāha- tatkiṃ manyase mahārāja api nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet,
1130:309: atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇī na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
1130:311: anyatra yāvadeva sa puruṣo vighātasya klamathasya bhāgī syāt yastāmabhiniviśet |
1130:312: bhagavānāha- evameva mahārāja bālo'śrutavān pṛthagjanaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyānyabhiniviśet |
1130:314: anunītaḥ saṃrajyate saṃrakto rāgajaṃ karmābhisaṃskaroti - trividhaṃ kāyena,
1130:317: tacca karma abhisaṃskṛtamādita eva kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ na pūrvā diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
1130:318: na dakṣiṇāṃ na paścimāṃ nottarāṃ nordhvaṃ nādho nānuvidiśaṃ neha na tiryak,
1130:320: tatpunaḥ kālāntareṇa maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite jīvitendriyanirodhe āyuṣaḥ parikṣayāttatsabhāgasya karmaṇaḥ kṣīṇatvāccaramavijñānasya nirudhyamānasya manasa ārambaṇībhavati |
1130:321: tadyathāpi nāma śayitavibuddhasya janapadakalyāṇīti [ manasa ārambaṇaṃ bhavati |
1130:322: iti ] hi mahārāja caramavijñānenādhipatinā tena ca karmaṇā ārambaṇena aupapattyaṃśikaddhayapratyayaṃ prathamavijñānamutpadyate |
1130:329: tasya ca prathamavijñānasya aupapattyaṃśikasya samanantaraniruddhasya anantarasabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate,
1130:331: tatra yaścaramavijñānasya nirodhastatra cyutiriti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati |
1130:333: iti hi mahārāja na kāściddharmo'smāllokātparaṃ lokaṃ gacchati,
1130:350: na cātra kaścitkartā na bhoktā'nyatra nāmasaṃketāt |
1130:351: tadyathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare śatruṇā sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayet |
1130:353: tatkiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyate svapnāntare śatruḥ,
1130:356: bhagavānāha- tatkiṃ manyase mahārāja api nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet yo'sau svapnāntare śatrumabhiniviśet,
1130:360: atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapne śatrurna saṃvidyate,
1130:362: anyatra yāvadeva sa puruṣo vighātasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt yastamabhiniviśet |
1130:363: bhagavānāha-evameva mahārāja bālo'śrutavān pṛthagjanaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā daurmanasyasthānīyānyabhiniviśate |
1130:367: tadyathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare piśācena paripātyamāno bhītaḥ saṃmohamāpadyate |
1130:368: sa śayitavibuddhastaṃ piśācaṃ taṃ ca saṃmohamanusmaret |
1130:369: tatkiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyante svapne piśācaḥ saṃmoho vā?
1130:370: yāvadevameva mahārāja bālo'śrutavān pṛthagjanaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā upekṣāsthānīyānyabhiniviśate,
1130:373: tadyathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇyā gāyantyā madhuraṃ gītasvaraṃ madhuraṃ ca tantrīsvaraṃ ca śṛṇuyāt |
1130:376: tatkiṃ manyase mahārāja api nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyaḥ svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇyā gītavāditabhiniviśet?
1130:379: atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇī strī na saṃvidyate,
1130:382: anyatra yāvadeva sa puruṣo vighātasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt,
1130:384: bhagavānāha evameva mahārāja bālo'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā saumanasyasthānīyānyabhiniviśate |
1130:388: atra mahārāja mānasaṃ nirveśayitavyam kimityahaṃ sadevakasya lokasya cakṣurbhaveyam,
1130:390: kūlaṃ naustīrtham nāyakaḥ pariṇāyakaḥ daiśikaḥ sārthavāhaḥ |
1130:395: pūrvā hi koṭirmahārāja na prajñāyate aiśvaryādhipatyānāmanubhūyamānānām |
1130:398: atra anantayaśaścakravartinaḥ kathā - svargācca patite tasmin sarājakaiḥ pauraiḥ parivṛta evaṃ paṭhayate |
1130:399: tadyathāpi nāma mahārāja sarpirmaṇḍo vā navanītamaṇḍo vā taptāyāṃ bālukāyāmupanikṣipto'vasīdati,
1130:401: evameva mahārāja anantayaśā avasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate |
1130:402: atha rājā priyaṃkaro rājānamanantayaśasaṃ tathāvasīdantamupasaṃkramyaitadavocat- kiṃ vayaṃ mahārāja lokasya vyākuryāmaḥ?
1130:404: sa āha- vaktavyaṃ mahārāja anantayaśāścaturdvīpeṣu rājyaiśvaryaṃ kārayitvā vandhyamanorathatāmanubhūya sarvadrumākālaphalatāṃ sarvopadravaprastrabdhisarvasattvāvandhyamanorathatāṃ gandhodakavarṣaṃ hiraṇyavarṣaṃ suvarṇavarṣaṃ sarvopakaraṇavarṣaṃ cānubhūya caturo mahādvīpānadhyāvasitvā śakrasyārdhāsanamākramya atīcchayā na muktaḥ,
1130:409: tasmāttarhi te mahārāja marīcikāyāmudakasvabhāvo nābhunna bhaviṣyati na caitarhi vidyate |
1130:410: evameva mahārāja rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ svabhāvo nābhūnna bhaviṣyati,
1130:412: punarapyuktam- etāvaccaitat jñeyam yaduta saṃvṛtiḥ paramārthaśca |
1130:413: tacca bhagavatā śūnyataḥ sudṛṣṭaṃ suviditaṃ susākṣātkṛtam |
1130:417: so'nabhilāpyaḥ anājñeyo'vijñeyo'deśito'prakāśito yāvadakriyo yāvanna lābho nālābho na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ na yaśo nāyaśaḥ,
1130:429: punaścoktam-katama eṣa dharmo yo bhagavatā vyākṛto'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
1130:430: kiṃ rūpamuta vedanā āhosvitsaṃjñā utāho saṃskārāḥ atha vijñānaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti |
1130:431: teṣāmetadabhūt- na rūpaṃ yāvanna vijñānaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
1130:447: tathā atraivāhurnirmāṇaratayoḥ- devā yathā vayaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānīmaḥ,
1130:455: tathā vihāsyante bhagavan ye kecit parinirvātukāmāḥ |
1130:459: punaruktam- bhūtakoṭiriti bhagavan yadukta nirmāṇaratibhirdevaistatra vayaṃ bhūtamapi nopalabhāmahe,
1130:466: supiti yatha naraḥ kṣudhābhibhūtaḥ śatarasabhojanabhuñjino ca tṛptaḥ |
1130:467: na pi ca kṣudha na bhojanaṃ na sattvaḥ supina yathaiva nidṛṣṭa sarvadharmāḥ ||
1130:468: bhaṇi naru paṭhane manojñavācaṃ priyu bhavatī na ca saṃkramo'sti vācam |
1130:469: na ca vacana na cāsya rakta vācāmupalabhase na ca tatra saṃśayo'sti ||
1130:470: śruṇati yatha manojña vīṇaśabdaṃ madhura na cāsti svabhāvataḥ sa śabdaḥ |
1130:471: tatha imi vidu skandha prekṣamāṇo na labhati bhāvu svabhāvataḥ sumedhāḥ || pe||
1130:472: yatha naru iha śaṅkhaśabda śrutvā vimṛśati vidva kuto ya prādurbhūtaḥ |
1130:473: na ca labhati svabhāva śūnyabhāvaṃ tatha tvaya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ ||
1130:474: yatha naru iha bhojanaṃ praṇītaṃ vimṛśati aṅgaśu siddhamasvabhāvam |
1130:475: yatha rasu tatha te'ṅga tatsvabhāvāstatha tvaya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ ||
1130:476: yatha naru iha indrayaṣṭi dṛṣṭvā vimṛśati aṅgaśu niḥsvabhāva śūnyam |
1130:477: vimṛśatu yatha yaṣṭi te'ṅga śūnyāstatha tvaya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ ||
1130:478: puravara yatha aṅgaśo vibhajya nagaru svabhāvatu nāmato na labdham |
1130:479: yatha nagara tathāṅga sarvaśūnyāstatha tvaya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ ||
1130:480: mudita yatha na rāgamukta bherī harṣa janeti svabhāvaśūnyaśabdā |
1130:481: svaru ya[tha] tatha te'ṅga tatsvabhāvaṃ tatha tvaya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ ||
1130:482: hanatu yatha narasya tāṃ hi bherīṃ pratighu na vidyati nāpi snehadhātuḥ ||
1130:483: vimṛśatu bherīva te'ṅga tatsvabhāvāḥ tatha tvaya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ |
1130:484: hanatu yatha narasya tāṃ hi bherīṃ svaru na sa manyati rāmayāmi lokam |
1130:485: svaru yatha tatha te'ṅga tatsvabhāvāḥ tatha tvaya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ ||
1130:486: hanatu yatha narasya tasya bheryāṃ na pi svaru aṅgaśu nāpi sa svatantraḥ |
1130:487: svaru yatha tatha te'ṅga tatsvabhāvāstatha tvaya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ ||
1130:489: sattvārambaṇa nāyakena kathitā maitrī śubhā bhāvanā
1130:490: sattvaścāsya vibhāvitaḥ suviditaṃ niḥsattva sarvaṃ jagat |
1130:492: tena tvā sugataṃ vibhāvitamarti pūjema pūjāriham ||
1130:494: sattveṣū karuṇā ca nāma bhaṇitā devātideva tvayā |
1130:495: evaṃ bho jinapuṃgavā jinamataṃ ājñāta yāthāvataḥ
1130:497: sattvā naiva na duḥkha śākyamuninā yasyāpanītaṃ dukhaṃ
1130:500: [tasmāt] pūjiya tvāṃ narāṇa pravaraṃ prāyema prāptaṃ phalam ||
1130:502: naivaṃ te smṛtināyakā na bhaṇitā nava pramuṣṭā smṛtiḥ |
1130:503: uktaṃ co sugatena bhāvapathimāḥ kāyaṃ gatā bhāvanāḥ
1130:504: evaṃ buddhanayaṃ viditva sugatā pūjā kṛtā tāyinaḥ ||
1130:506: śāntāste bhagavan savāsanamalā yehī jagat kliśyate |
1130:507: śamathaścātha vipaśyanā na ca malā sarve ti śūnyā mune
1130:508: asmin devagaṇā na kāṅkṣa kkacanā pūjentu tvāṃ nāyakam || ityādi||
1130:510: yasya ca dharmasya svabhāvo na vidyate,
1130:522: no tu khalu paramārthato riktamupalabhyate na muṣṭiḥ |
1130:523: evaṃ cakṣuścendriyaṃ ca riktamuṣṭisadṛśamalīkamasadbhūtaṃ tucchaṃ muṣā moṣadharma bālopalāpanaṃ mūrkhasaṃmohanam,
1130:530: atraiva ca drumeṇa kinnararājena bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ pratyāha- yadvadasi śūnyatāṃ ca vyākaraṇaṃ cāpyahaṃ na jānāmi |
1130:541: imāṃ ca pūjāṃ druma a[ ṅgaśo] vicārayasi |
1130:544: yadapi ca nirīhakatvaṃ kriyāṃ ca na jānase mayā proktam |
1130:546: karma ca me ākhyātaṃ kartā na vidyate daśasu dikṣu |
1130:547: vāteritādiva taroryathā hi na nivartate vahniḥ ||
1130:548: na ca māruto na ca taruścetayati hutāśanaṃ ca yajane |
1130:550: yadapi vadase- na ca saṃcayaḥ puṇyasya hi vidyate,
1130:553: yathā bhaṇasi manuṣyāṇāmāyuḥ parimāṇaṃ varṣaśataṃ jīvin |
1130:556: bhagavatyāmapyuktam- kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte utpanno dharma utpadyate utānutpannaḥ?
1130:559: dharmasaṃgītyāmapyuktam- tathatā tathateti kulaputra śūnyatāyā etadadhivacanam |
1130:560: sā ca śūnyatā notpadyate na nirudhyate |
1130:561: āha- yadyevaṃ dharmāḥ śūnyā uktā bhagavatā,
1130:564: āha- evameva kulaputra tathā yathā amisaṃbudhyase- sarvadharmā notpadyante na nirudhyante |
1130:565: āha- yadetaduktaṃ bhagavatā- saṃskṛtā dharmā utpadyante nirudhyante ca ,
1130:568: tatra tathāgato mahākāruṇiko lokasyottrāsapadaparihārārthaṃ vyavahāravaśāduktavān-utpadyante nirudhyante ceti |
1130:569: na cātra kasyaciddharmasyotpādo na nirodha iti ||
1130:570: punaratraivoktam- tatra bhagavaṃścakṣū rūpeṣu na raṇati śrotraṃ śabdeṣu |
1130:571: yāvanmano dharmeṣu na raṇati, sa dharmaḥ |
1130:572: tatra kathaṃ cakṣū rūpeṣu na raṇati?
1130:579: parasparaṃ na jānanti na vijānanti na kalpayanti na vikalpayanti |
1130:590: yadapyahaṃ bhagavannevaṃ vadāmi- evamahaṃ jānāmi evamahaṃ budhyāmīti,
1130:592: na ca bhagavannāyatanānāmevaṃ bhavati- asmākameṣa vikāra iti |
1130:596: tathā dharmadarśanaṃ buddhadarśanaṃ sarvasattvadarśanaṃ sarvasattvahetupratyayadarśanaṃ śūnyatādarśanamadarśanam |
1130:601: kasya punaḥ śūnyatāvādinaḥ paramārthataḥ sthāṇuḥ siddho yadāśrayātpuruṣabhrāntiḥ syāt?
1130:625: tathā śūnyatāvādino na kkacidanurāgo na virāgaḥ |
1130:630: yaḥ kkaciddharme rajyate vā virajyate vā |
1130:632: yaḥ kenacitsārdhaṃ vigrahaṃ vivādaṃ vā kuryāt |
1130:636: ayaivamapi paramaviśuddhirdharmadarśane sati iha pañcakaṣāyasaṃkliṣṭasya kalyāṇamitrāvasāditasya vā saṃkṣepeṇa tāvatkutra yatnaṃ kṛtvā śīghraṃ cittaśuddhirbhavati?
1130:638: sā caitadabhyāsātsukaraṃ prahīyata iti paragauravamātmāvajñā caivaṃ bhāvanīyā-
1130:639: yadi sattvo yadi skandhāḥ kṣamatā sarvathā sthitā |
1130:652: paraḥ kila mayi prīta ityayaṃ me matibhramaḥ ||
1130:653: tattuṣṭayaiva mama prītiḥ sāmānye na sadāstu sā |
1130:654: tatsukhena na cetkāryaṃ tena tuṣṭena kiṃ mama ||
1130:655: anyatra mayi vā prītyā kiṃ hi me parakīyayā ||
1130:656: na me pareṇa tuṣṭena kāye saukhyamihāṇvapi ||
1130:659: na dharmo nāyurārogyaṃ na balaṃ vandanādibhiḥ |
1130:663: saṃstavatyāgācca śīghraṃ cittaviśuddhirbhavati iti tatrāpi cintyate-
1130:673: ahaṃ caitacca sarvaṃ ca nacirānna bhaviṣyati || iti ||
